name: Mary (itch)
description:
Mary is a top down stealth zombie game with a difference. You play as Mary, a cute little zombie girl. Mary is a tired and full zombie, and wants to have a nap. Guide her to her resting place to complete the game. Avoid the survivors lights, as they are very good shots.

Key features:

  • Atmospheric but simple pixel art design
  • Stealth element
  • Once caught in the survivors lights you are dead and have to start over
  • Interactivity with cars- ability to crawl under them to avoid enemy sight

Release date: 26th June 2015

Platform: Web

Price: Free
